sections.heading: Trust; marital deduction; when provisions applicable
sections.text: Section 30-3135, as amended by Laws 2009, LB 80, applies to a trust described in subsection (d) of section 30-3135 on and after the following dates:(1) If the trust is not funded as of February 27, 2009, the date of the decedent's death;(2) If the
